hero.description: Penta Studio helps businesses worldwide design, build, and scale modern web, mobile, and cloud-native solutions.

ourServices.title: Our Services
ourServices.subtitle: Building future-ready digital solutions
ourServices.description: At Penta Studio, we provide more than just development, we craft end-to-end digital products that help businesses innovate, grow, and scale with confidence. From sleek websites to powerful mobile apps, from intuitive designs to cloud-native systems, our services are tailored to turn your vision into measurable outcomes.

services.title: Management Systems
services.description: We design and build custom management platforms like ERP, CRM, and dashboards that give you real-time visibility and control. Automate workflows, track performance, and make smarter decisions with tailored systems built around your business needs.

services.title: AI Tools & Automation
services.description: Unlock the power of artificial intelligence with tools that optimize efficiency and decision-making. From predictive analytics and chatbots to automated workflows, we help you integrate AI to streamline operations and boost customer experiences.

services.title: Cloud & DevOps
services.description: We help you deploy and scale with confidence using cloud-native infrastructure and DevOps practices. With CI/CD pipelines, autoscaling, and 24/7 monitoring, our solutions keep your systems secure, reliable, and ready for growth at any scale.

services.title: Mobile Applications
services.description: We create high-performance mobile apps for iOS and Android that combine sleek design with flawless functionality. Whether it’s a consumer-facing app or an enterprise tool, we deliver intuitive experiences that keep users engaged and businesses connected.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Our team delivers modern, scalable, and secure websites that don’t just look good, they perform. From corporate sites to e-commerce platforms, we build web solutions that are SEO-friendly, responsive, and optimized for growth and reliability.

ourServices.substitleforButton: Your next big product starts here — let`s build it together.

ourProcess.title: Our Process
ourProcess.subtitle: From vision to launch, built for results
ourProcess.description: At Penta Studio, we follow a structured process that balances creativity, engineering, and speed. Every step is designed to reduce risks, deliver value fast, and ensure your product scales with confidence.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: We gather insights, define goals, and identify early risks to build a clear product vision.

steps.title: Definition
steps.description: Shape requirements, validate product-market fit, and align the roadmap with business needs.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Create wireframes, prototypes, and user-tested interfaces to ensure usability from day one.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: Agile sprints with weekly demos, CI/CD, and strong QA to deliver high-quality software.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: Deploy securely, monitor performance, and support a smooth transition to production.

steps.title: Post-Launch Growth
steps.description: We provide continuous updates, scaling strategies, and feature enhancements to keep your product ahead.

ourPortfolio.title: Our Portfolio
ourPortfolio.subtitle: Custom Software Development Success Stories
ourPortfolio.description: Discover how Penta Studio has transformed businesses through innovative software solutions. From Fortune 500 enterprises to innovative startups, explore our portfolio of 50+ successful projects including web applications, mobile apps, e-commerce platforms, and enterprise systems that deliver measurable ROI and competitive advantages.

feedback.title: What Our Clients Say
feedback.description: Real feedback from businesses that trusted Penta Studio to build and scale their digital products.

get_started.title: Your Next Big Product Starts Here
get_started.subtitle: Let's turn your idea into a high-impact digital solution

section1.title: About Penta Studio
section1.description: At Penta Studio, we design more than software, we create the digital infrastructure that drives innovation. Our mission is to help businesses of all sizes rethink operations, customer engagement, and growth through secure, future-ready digital solutions.

points.title: We specialize in every layer of enterprise-grade software:
list: Customer experience platforms that enhance user engagement
Custom management systems (ERP, CRM) that streamline internal operations

section2.title: Why We Stand Out
section2.description: We combine human-centric design with scalable engineering to deliver measurable results across industries.

cards.title: Outcome-Driven
cards.description: Every solution we build is aligned with real business goals.

cards.title: Human-Centric
cards.description: We design experiences that benefit customers, employees, and stakeholders.

cards.title: Future-Ready
cards.description: We design experiences that benefit customers, employees, and stakeholders.

section3.title: Ready to Build Something Remarkable?
section3.description: Whether you're launching a digital product or transforming internal workflows, our team is ready to bring your vision to life.

content.personalInformation: Name, email address, phone number, company details, and any information you provide when contacting us or filling out forms.
content.projectInformation: Details you share about your business needs, project scope, or requirements when working with us.
content.technicalInformation: IP address, browser type, device information, cookies, and usage data collected automatically when you visit our website.
content.paymentInformation: When applicable, billing details and payment-related data processed securely by third-party providers.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
content: Deliver and improve our services (web, mobile, dashboards, AI tools, etc.).
Respond to inquiries, provide project estimates, and communicate updates.
Process transactions and manage client accounts.
Enhance website performance, security, and user experience.
Send updates, newsletters, or promotional content (only if you opt-in).
Comply with legal obligations and resolve disputes.

content.policy: We do not sell or rent your personal information.
sharedWith: Trusted Service Providers: For hosting, analytics, payment processing, and cloud infrastructure.
Business Partners: In cases where collaboration is required for project delivery.
Legal Authorities: If required by law or to protect our rights, safety, or property.
content.note: All third parties are obligated to maintain confidentiality and use your data only for agreed purposes.

sections.title: Data Security
content: Encryption for data transmission and storage.
Access controls and authentication for sensitive systems.
Regular monitoring, vulnerability testing, and updates.
No method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights: Access, update, or delete your personal data.
Request a copy of the data we hold about you.
Restrict or object to certain types of data processing.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.content: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law.

sections.title: International Data Transfers
sections.content: Your information may be transferred and stored outside your country of residence with appropriate safeguards in place.

sections.title: Updates to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Updates will be posted on this page with the effective date.

terms_page.1. Acceptance of Terms: By using our services, you agree to these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, you should not use our website or services.
terms_page.2. Services Provided:
Penta Studio specializes in:
- Web development and design.
- Mobile applications (iOS & Android).
- AI tools, automation, and dashboards.
- Cloud-native and DevOps solutions.
- Custom enterprise management systems (ERP, CRM, etc.).
All services are delivered based on agreed project scopes, contracts, and timelines.
terms_page.3. Use of Our Website & Content:
You may browse our website and access publicly available content for personal or business use.
You agree not to copy, resell, or misuse our content, brand, or intellectual property without prior written consent.
Unauthorized use of our website may result in legal action.
terms_page.4. Client Responsibilities:
When engaging with Penta Studio:
- You agree to provide accurate project details, requirements, and communication.
- You are responsible for ensuring that any data or content you provide does not infringe third-party rights.
- You agree to meet agreed payment terms, as outlined in individual contracts.
terms_page.5. Intellectual Property:
All code, designs, and solutions developed by Penta Studio remain our intellectual property until full payment is received.
After delivery and payment, ownership rights are transferred as per contract agreements.
Penta Studio retains the right to showcase non-confidential parts of projects in its portfolio.
terms_page.6. Payments & Billing:
Payment terms are defined in project agreements.
Late payments may incur additional fees or suspension of services.
All payments are non-refundable unless otherwise agreed in writing.
terms_page.7. Confidentiality: Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of sensitive information exchanged during projects. This obligation continues even after the termination of services.
terms_page.8. Warranties & Limitations:
Penta Studio guarantees professional services delivered with best practices in software engineering.
However, we do not warrant that our services will be error-free, uninterrupted, or suitable for every purpose.
Penta Studio is not liable for indirect damages, loss of business, or data issues resulting from client misuse.
terms_page.9. Termination:
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate services if:
- The client breaches these Terms.
- Payments are not made as agreed.
- The project involves unlawful or unethical activities.
Clients may also terminate contracts with written notice, as per agreement terms.
terms_page.10. Updates to Terms: We may revise these Terms of Service periodically. Updates will be posted on this page with the effective date. Your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of changes.
terms_page.11. Governing Law:
These Terms of Service shall be governed and construed in accordance with the applicable international business laws and relevant national laws. Depending on the client’s location, disputes may be subject to the jurisdiction of:
- European Union Law and Finnish Law for clients in the EU region.
- United States Federal and State Law for clients in North America.
- Saudi Arabian Law for clients in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
- United Arab Emirates Law for clients in the UAE.
- Egyptian Law for clients in Egypt and MENA.
- International Business Law for global transactions.
terms_page.12. Contact Us:
For any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
- Email: penta.studioo@gmail.com
- Phone: +358 50 5300004
- Location: Virkakatu 8J, 90570, Oulu, Finland
